Class HomeScreenController

  • java.lang.Object

extends MyController
    Holds the functions for operating the Home Screen.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeOnLogin

        public void initializeOnLogin()
        Called when the user successfully logs in.

      • viewAppointmentsButtonListener

        public void viewAppointmentsButtonListener()
        Called when the View Appointments button is pressed. Redirects the user to the Appointments screen.

      • viewCustomersButtonListener

        public void viewCustomersButtonListener()
        Called when the View Customers button is pressed. Redirects the user to the Customers screen.

      • viewReportsButtonListener

        public void viewReportsButtonListener()
        Called when the View Reports button is pressed. Redirects the user to the Reports screen.

      • logoutButtonListener

        public void logoutButtonListener()
        Called when the Log Out button is pressed. Resets the login form and redirects the user to the Login Form.
